releaseNotes:
1. Optimized "HODLer Airdrop" and airdrops are more generous for GT holders.
2. Optimized "Flash Trading" in Web3 for faster transactions.

Gate.io is dedicated to providing you with a better user experience. You are welcome to submit feedback or tickets anytime. We are excited to hear from you!
description:
Gate.io is one of the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchanges, with the most number of cryptocurrencies available for trade. It is the perfect option for beginners to advanced crypto traders who need a reliable, secure and user-friendly mobile app to start trading. 

Download Gate.io crypto exchange mobile app and buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB) and other altcoins now!

MORE THAN 3,700+ CRYPTOCURRENCIES
You can buy Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Tether (USDT), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Cardano (ADA), Solana (SOL), Polkadot (DOT), Dai (DAI), TRON (TRX), Avalanche (AVAX), Polygon (MATIC), Chainlink (LINK), Litecoin (LTC), NEAR Protocol (NEAR), Kaspa (KAS), Aptos (APT), PEPE, dogwifhat (WIF), Worldcoin (WLD) and many other cryptos.

SAFE, RELIABLE AND TRANSPARENT
Gate.io is one of the most secure crypto exchanges in the world, and has been providing industry-leading security since its launch. Regardless of login, transaction, and withdrawal, it provides a full range of active or passive protection. Gate.io has also emerged Top out of 100 crypto exchanges in terms of cybersecurity scores, as evaluated by respected cybersecurity organisations in the crypto industry. 

CRYPTO EXCHANGE FEATURES & TOOLS
Gate.io offers a wide range of services for those looking to get into the cryptocurrency market.

• Price Alerts
Our mobile app is designed for easy and convenient trading. You can customise your dashboard to get crypto market insights, and set automatic buys and price alerts with a single tap. Stay up to date on the latest prices and trends with real-time notifications on your favourite cryptocurrencies.

• Spot Trading
User-friendly interface that is designed for efficient and convenient real-time trading. With it, you can buy, sell and trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and other cryptocurrencies with ease.

EARN THROUGH REFERRAL PROGRAM
Invite your friends and earn up to 50% of our commissions.

ABOUT GATE.IO CRYPTO EXCHANGE
Founded in 2013, Gate.io has become one of the leading crypto exchanges in the world. The company prides itself on providing industry-leading security in addition to having been audited to show 100% proof of reserves. Gate.io operates in many countries across the globe and prioritises and commits to ensuring regulatory compliance in all jurisdictions where it operates. We provide over 10 million users around the world with safe, reliable, and transparent digital asset trading services.

NEED MORE HELP?
Feel free to reach out to our 24/7 customer support if you have any questions or issues. 

Help centre: www.gate.io/help
Email: support@mail.gate.io
Website: www.gate.io

Our services are available in selected territories based on jurisdiction.
